definition: to bring sth to sb/to deliver
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
similar/resembling/to resemble/to be like
surname Xiao/Taiwan pr. [Xiao4]
to bring sth to sb (news etc)
to take a letter/to send word

sentences.english: I'll give you a message for your Master Shifu.
sentences.chinese: 那你也替我捎個信給你那個什麼師父。

sentences.english: We'll post an image of the netherwhelp, offspring of the nether drake flying mount, in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在捎後放出虛空飛龍幼崽的資料。

sentences.english: Mr. Ball has just called on Mrs. Zhu to give her a message.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾先生拜訪朱夫人給她捎個口信。

sentences.english: One evening I went to Jim's room to deliver a phone message.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上，我去他的房間給他捎個電話留言。

sentences.english: Would you be kind enough to take a message to him?
Bring back some tea for me.
Don't forget to convey my regards when you see him.
sentences.chinese: 你去見着他，別忘了給我捎個好兒。

sentences.english: He's not in. May I take a message for him?
sentences.chinese: 他不在，我能替他捎個口信嗎？

sentences.english: Give me messge if you have something difficult.
sentences.chinese: 萬一有什麼困難，請給我捎個信。

sentences.english: A man called Xiao Feng ask me to take a message to you.
sentences.chinese: 一個叫肖峯的人讓我給你捎口信。

sentences.english: May I trouble you to pass on a message to her?
Please give my regards to everybody.
Finally, I picked up Karen and we headed for the drive-in.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我在開往露天電影場的路上捎上卡倫。

definition: to bring sth to sb (news etc)
to take a letter/to send word
by the way/while out doing sth else/conveniently
oral message
on the way
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
to accept or reject
before leaving/on departure
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
to send word/to deliver a letter
before/day before yesterday
on leaving/on the point of departure
spare time/free time
to prepare/to arrange (sth to be offered)
to take along with one
